resources.string: Response from server unsuccessful, please try again later.
Connection to server failed, please try again.
Please check your internet connection and try again
Location accuracy can be improved by turning choosing high accuracy in location services
Please add Soapp into any whiltelists for battery manager apps if you can\'t receive push notifications
Please allow Soapp to receive push notifications in the Auto-start Manager.
Please allow Soapp to receive push notifications under Protected Apps.
Please disable battery optimisation for Soapp by clicking on the \"Detail\" button in the next screen to receive push notifications.
You may not be able to receive push notifications from your friends or appointment reminders
To get push notifications, lock Soapp in the recent apps tab by dragging it downwards
Please update Soapp to the latest version to continue using Soapp.
Please update Soapp to enjoy the latest features available.
Unable to open Google Play Store - please update Soapp manually by searching for \"Soapp\" in Google Play Store
You will not be able to access Soapp after
Please allow camera and storage access to start taking pictures.
Please allow storage access to start viewing photos in the gallery.
Please allow microphone and storage access to start recording audio.
Permission granted! Tap and hold onto the microphone to start recording audio.
Please allow location access to start searching for nearby restaurants
Please allow location access to start access map nearby functions
Please turn on GPS to start searching for nearby restaurants.
Please allow phone call access to start a phone call.
Soapp requires permission to access contacts and storage in order to function properly
Please enable Soapp to change systems settings in order to access Notifications

A 6-digit confirmation code has been sent to your phone number, please wait for the code and input it into the field above. If you do not receive the code in 2 minutes, please click on the \"re-send code\" button to get a new code, or try again later.
The 6-digit code is invalid, please click the \"re-send code\" button or try again later.
There are currently no promotions for this restaurant
You can only place a booking 3 hours ahead of now.
You can no longer edit this booking as you have edited it 3 times.
Are you sure you would like to continue with this booking?
Thank you. Your booking has been sent for review. Please check your status in \"My Bookings\". You have
Are you sure you\'d like to cancel and delete this booking?
Would you like to update booking details to appointment?
Booking no longer exist as it has been cancelled or deleted
Please select a booking Date and time slot
Please select the number of guests for this booking
Please click on the nearby button to try searching again.
Please enable location access and GPS to search nearby restaurants.
Please enable location permission to search nearby restaurants.
D I S C O V E R
Please wait while we search for friends who are already on Soapp, and re-join old groups if you\'re a returning user.
Your Soapp contacts will be synced with your phone contacts, which will take some time depending on the number of contacts.
Would you like to call this contact\?
Tap here to start adding favourite restaurants now!
Tap here to start booking now!

F A V O R I T E S
P R O F I L E

Tap here to start Soapp-ing now!
Tap here to start scheduling an appointment now!
Are you sure you want to block this user?
Are you sure you want to unblock this user?
You have changed the appointment title from
has changed the appointment title from
Please update Soapp to the latest version
Are you sure you want to clear the chat history?
Contact has been added to Soapp
Contact has been added to phone book
You have been removed from the group
has been removed from the group
You have been added to the group
Are you sure want to delete?
Are you sure you want to leave this group?
Selected members already exist in this group
has been added to the group
You have added a few members to the group
Please select at least one member for the new group
Please input a group name to proceed
Only the host can delete the appointment
Would you like to clear all appointment notification badges? This action cannot be un-done
Please make sure that you have set the appointment title, date, time and location.
Please make sure that you have filled in the group name.
The group appointment has been created
Please select a location by searching or choosing a POI from the map.
Are you sure you want to delete this appointment?
Are you sure you want to update your status?
Would you like to check for old groups and re-join them\?
Are you sure you want to delete your Soapp Account? This action CANNOT be un-done.
Please select DELETE to confirm deletion of your Soapp account. ALL of your chat and appointments will be deleted as well.

Thank you very much for downloading Soapp, We hope you enjoy using it. If you face any issues with the app or simply wish to drop us a message, just use the "contact us" button in the Soapp Settings tab to get to us. Otherwise, enjoy!
Tap or scan to add contact
